name: Wireless Headphones
description: Comfortable wireless headphones with noise cancellation and long battery life.

name: Smartwatch
description: Feature-packed smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and customizable watch faces.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact and powerful Bluetooth speaker with rich sound and a durable, water-resistant design.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic laptop stand with adjustable height and angle to improve posture and comfort.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Versatile USB-C hub with multiple ports, including HDMI, USB 3.0, and SD card reader.

name: Smart Home Assistant
description: Voice-controlled smart home assistant with smart speaker and integrated AI.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Advanced electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes and a long-lasting battery.

name: Digital Camera
description: High-resolution digital camera with optical zoom and various shooting modes.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Wearable fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, step counting, and sleep analysis.

name: Tablet
description: Versatile tablet with a high-resolution display, fast processor, and long battery life.
